name: Farm of Harm
description:
Created for the Bevy Game Jam with the theme COMBINE. I may have taken it slightly too literally.

Control with WASD keys. Hit stuff to get some physics and sound effects.

The concept here is a demolition derby but with farm equipment. My main inspiration was the battle mode of Crash Team Racing. Unfortunately, I had a very rough time getting the combine to play well physics and I'm still unhappy with the outcome.

Given the amount of time I spent making the model sort of behave like a vehicle I didn't have much left to get a game into it. I had big plans for points based obstacle smash and a competitive AI but that's for another time.

Github Link - https://github.com/RichTeaMan/combine-derby
